name: Plattchen: Twist 'n' Paint
description:
Use your Fantasy! PLÄTTCHEN – twist ’n’ paint is a crazy, challenging
puzzle shooter with more than 100 hours of fun that supports up to eight
players simultaneously. Guard the birth of ZeLeLi and free them from the
menace of the evil black Shadow Plättchen. Play as one of the countless
FantasyMEs and fight as an astronaut, butterfly, car, football, or many
more against sharks, cowboys, asteroids, and skulls in numerous,
fabulous Fantasy Worlds. Use items and multipliers in combos to fight
your way to the top of the high scores and find the perfect way to solve
a level! Go wild in the three completely different game modes of
PLÄTTCHEN – twist ’n’ paint with more than 300 levels. Twist yourself
along with your friends cooperatively or against each other through the
many multiplayer modes.
